description: This file contains documentation and code snippets related to methods within a Blits component, including an example of a component definition with lifecycle hooks, input handlers, and methods.

classes.name: Blits.Component
classes.description: A function used to define a new Blits component with specified configuration, including template, state, hooks, input handlers, and methods.

methods.name: fetchData
methods.description: An asynchronous method that fetches data from an external API and updates the component's items state.
